item.title: With Trump pressure and a 'new Lebanon,' can Hezbollah's shadow economy be dismantled?
item.description: "Hezbollah finds itself in its greatest predicament since its foundation," one regional expert told CNBC.

item.title: Mass shooting at Manhattan skyscraper leaves 5 dead, including gunman
item.description: New York Police Commissioner Jessica Tisch said the gunman, identified as Shane Tamura, a 27-year-old Las Vegas resident, had driven to New York in re...

item.title: Judge rejects bid by Trump ally to open Fed interest rate meeting to the public
item.description: Azoria Capital sued Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell to force the Federal Open Market Committee to open its interest rate meetings to the public...

item.title: Trade court won't reinstate tariff exemption on low-value 'de minimis' shipments, for now
item.description: A federal appeals court will soon hear oral arguments in a major case challenging Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs.

item.title: Trump seeks quick deposition of Rupert Murdoch in Jeffrey Epstein letter defamation case
item.description: President Donald Trump has angrily denied writing his then-friend Jeffrey Epstein a letter marking his 50th birthday.
